description:
Ichigo and Ulquiorra begin to fight in the depths of Las Noches. Ichigo fights Ulquiorra at full power right from the start, using his Bankai and even his Hollowfication. Ulquiorra is overwhelmed by his great strength, but strategically retaliates when Ichigo removes his Hollow`s mask. Meanwhile, Renji`s Bankai is sealed away as he fights Szayel Aporro. Szayel Aporro continues to have a home-field advantage as he effortlessly blocks Renji`s attacks and calls on some of his subordinates
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le rire de Szayel Aporro, Renji complètement piégé
Szayel Aporro Laughs, The Net Trapping Renji is Complete
Warau Szayel Aporro, Renji Houimou Kansei
笑うザエルアポロ, 恋次包囲網完成
